meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the February 26, 2025 City Council Meeting
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Authorize revisions to the Financial Management Performance Criteria
agenda_items.description: Revisions include establishing an Employee Benefit Reserve, clarifying pension benefit adjustments, and other financial management updates.

agenda_items.title: Amendment to Ordinance No. 32861
agenda_items.description: Amendments for transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2024-25.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of lawsuit Jon Puryear EMS CE LLC v. City of Dallas
agenda_items.description: Settlement of the lawsuit not to exceed $100,000.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of lawsuit Laura Alonzo v. City of Dallas
agenda_items.description: Settlement of the lawsuit not to exceed $82,000.

agenda_items.title: Authorize settlement of bodily injury claims by Sterling Bradshaw
agenda_items.description: Settlement of claims not to exceed $30,000.

agenda_items.title: Increase in joint election agreement with Collin County
agenda_items.description: Increase in election services contract for the November 5, 2024 special election.

agenda_items.title: Interlocal agreement with Dallas Independent School District
agenda_items.description: Agreement for emergency medical services during District events.

agenda_items.title: Sole source services agreement for asset tracking system
agenda_items.description: Agreement for equipment, maintenance, and support for the Dallas Police Department.

agenda_items.title: Standard Utility Agreement with the State of Texas
agenda_items.description: Agreement for water pipeline encasement extensions.

financial_items.description: Settlement of lawsuit Jon Puryear EMS CE LLC v. City of Dallas
Settlement of lawsuit Laura Alonzo v. City of Dallas
Settlement of bodily injury claims by Sterling Bradshaw
Increase in joint election agreement with Collin County
